title: whale2030
author: whale2030
content: Now the world is kind of recression and Crisis but it doesn't stay like this.Sooner or later fed will cut the rates and markets will turn back to bull run. When i look at the options /futures of btc /gold i see until 2028 bull run. (Needless to say i have economics and financial background) Needless to say USA will import inflation out of USA thanks Crisis in the other countries so they don't care about inflation they can still print money again.About ECONOMY - Needless to say the new project midas yield will use the DEFI to rebalance debt ( Im expecting aave/uni biggest bull run over the years ) Now the property prices are cheapest it's best time to invest. So let's collect money to buy to lease i have also partners who could do long term rent contracts also i have plan to launch new reality show "Kardashian style "so it will make huge profit trhough our partners.Let's start from new york manhattan i'll be working 247 with this project Im looking for serious investors  and cryptocurrency is perfect way to collect funds for project.I'll be negoiate for us best prices since many property owners struggles and having some issues so we can get some bargain aswell i might be signed as new property Manager who can deal with maintance and residents complains.Only Luxury property and since crisis have made a lot owners into problems it's good time to get some bargains and since banks don't lend this is the best time for crowd funding activity. Let's do it

comments.author: WhyFhy
comments.body: I've seen old scam ICO's that leveraged this concept. None turned out to be legit to my knowledge.The idea was that buyers of the ico where basically shareholders of the properties the ico was supposedly going to buy after fundraising.McAfee even had a John McAfee approved ICO real estate scam. The ideas cool but I haven't seen one take off. You'll likely have to build some serious reputation around here to get some motion.

comments.author: whale2030
comments.body: Quote from: WhyFhy on November 20, 2023, 09:57:06 AMI've seen old scam ICO's that leveraged this concept. None turned out to be legit to my knowledge.The idea was that buyers of the ico where basically shareholders of the properties the ico was supposedly going to buy after fundraising.McAfee even had a John McAfee approved ICO real estate scam. The ideas cool but I haven't seen one take off. You'll likely have to build some serious reputation around here to get some motion.I have reasons and methods to offering the cheap price to get it for cheap each investors here who will invest by crypto will be legally share holder aswell by the shares of company or REIT shares. I do it all legally with proper paperwork but i need serious investors on this and no it's not going to be ico.Sure you need reputation but in order to do anything you need reputation allready but then you need someone who's got the reputation who can back you up with funds sources and marketing. Mcafee was not some guy who just got the idea the strong marketing was behind him first he was just the front men the proxy like all of them. Talking about reputation, well the biggest mortgage fraud in history how the honest working people lost their homes it was 2008. So Who's is in and whos out ? My first project will be NYC upper East area the Property price 30,000,000$ but Im sure we get bargain since the economic difficult situation we could take out as mortgage but i prefer the spot market.This why the property prices are high becouse only very few are bought on spot market most of the prices been pumped up by futures positions in simple words the mortgage If there will be straight out the cash deals so i called the spot market deals the prices will be much lower so that's why when you buy with cash you can always get bargain specially now but we need to be fast before the fed start QE again then banks start taking leverage positions and pump it up prices again.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: A newbie's account without a trust record asks others to invest with him in real estate. Can you prove that you are from the United States and that you run a licensed real estate investment company, or do you want to give promises of getting rich quickly to people without having the slightest knowledge of investing?Can you list your previous deals or any evidence that confirms that it is good to trust you, and how you will be treated? Will you work as an intermediary or as one of the owners on behalf of investors? REIT shares are an ideal solution for anyone who wants exposure to real estate in this way and are available in almost all countries of the world.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: WhyFhy on November 20, 2023, 09:57:06 AMI've seen old scam ICO's that leveraged this concept. None turned out to be legit to my knowledge.Its true, there were bunch of ICOs with similar idea and to my knowledge all indeed turned out to be a scam but there is one legit project that is doing something similar to what OP plans to do and its called RealT.Similar to OP plan, RealT buys property and for each they issue new token that is connected specifically to that real estate and then they rent the property so owners of the shares get the profit (its usually ~10% per year). Few of my friends are investing there for years and so far they have been very satisfiied with it.

comments.author: r_victory
comments.body: I don't think you will have progress with your project here without more accurate information. Your account is new and this is already a reason to cause distrust. Prepare a better plan and present your proposal in detail, with deadlines and other information that helps people understand the real objectives of the business.

That's why i opened this thread to discuss how we do it then i'll call my other partner who's in building and property developement activity allready. But once we move forward with the project it's like snowball it getting bigger and bigger becouse more talented and connected people join with us and I will push everybody 247 to move Im very hard worker.The legal paperwork, well that's just the paperwork and it can get it done i have no limitations and i do not accept"no" If i want something i get it.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: whale2030 on November 20, 2023, 11:44:00 AMNewbie or not but we all have to start somehow.It is true that you have to start, but if a stranger knocks on your door and says that he is a real estate consultant, pay me $100,000 and you will get a dream home, and a company that has a workplace and a tax record that operates and owns assets in the market, which one will you choose?Quote from: whale2030 on November 20, 2023, 11:44:00 AMFirst i need to see how much i could get from here the estimated $ then i can offer some money to seller i can't just tell the price and then i don't have even 50% collected i'll be looking like fool then. Zero dollars, so far you are making promises. It is better to start by proving that you are a reliable person and have a legal or commercial record or at least previous experience in this field.

And once you join with this you definately will meet with other wealthy and successful people and more doors will be opened to you in your life.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP I would welcome you because you are a newbie and secondly, I would ask you this question, if you were to be in my position now reading this post how would you feel ? What would be your thoughts? Then I believe from that you would get your answer and know how to go about it.As a matter of fact, you have no reputation here to start with and possibly n ok experience as well because I do not see any portfolio to back up your claims.You calling on investors to invest in your project when you have nothing at hand to show forth. People are wise these days and would not easily give in to this scope. I think you better start up something to show forth becoming calling on investors so that you would have something to present when the need arises as no one would like to sink their funds just for nothing.
